close.description: Alt label text for an X icon button in alert.

extensionDescription.message: Nzìccacci a VPN dintra a Firefox: leva schedi, mposta a pusizzioni p'ogni situ e autru ancora!

back.description: Alternative text attribute for back button.

titleServerList.description: Title for a dialog where users can set the location for a website.

titlePageSettings.description: The header for website specific settings, i.e. exclude a page from VPN.

excludePageFor.message: Sdisattiva sempri a prutizzioni VPN pi $ORIGIN$
excludePageFor.description: Setting to exclude a website from VPN.

resetPageSettings.description: Button text to reset all site specific settings.

vpnIsOn.message: A prutizzioni VPN pi Firefox è attiva
vpnIsOn.description: Header to signal that VPN connection is enabled.

vpnIsOff.message: A prutizzioni VPN pi Firefox è sdisattiva
vpnIsOff.description: Header to signal that VPN connection is disabled.

extensionVpnIsOff.message: Mozilla VPN è ancora attiva, e sta prutiggennu u restu dû to computer.
extensionVpnIsOff.description: Popup subtitle when the extension VPN is off, but the client VPN is on.

vpnOffStatus.description: Label indicating that the VPN is off.

vpnOnStatus.description: Label indicating that the VPN is on.

placeholderSearchWebsites.description: Placeholder text for the search input field to search websites.

tableHeadingWebsite.description: Table heading for the column listing websites.

tableHeadingVpnStatus.description: Table heading for the column indicating whether the VPN is on or off for a website.

headlineNoWebsitePreferences.message: Ancora nun scartasti nuḍḍa prifirenza pî siti
headlineNoWebsitePreferences.description: Headline shown when the user hasn’t set any website preferences.

noWebsitePreferencesSubText.message: Cû stinneriu di Firefox, po' sdisattivari a prutizzioni di Mozilla VPN p'un situ sulu o pi nu nzemi di siti. Pi fàrilu, vìsita un situ, grapi u stinneriu e cancia i prifirenzi dû situ.
noWebsitePreferencesSubText.description: Subtext shown when there are no website preferences set by the user.

altTextRemoveWebsiteButton.description: Alternative text for the button that removes a website rule from the list of preferences.

altTextOpenSettingsPage.description: Alternative text for the button that opens the Extensions Settings page.

searchServer.description: Placeholder for the Input field where users can search the list of servers.

bodySubscribeNow2.message: Nun pòttimu attruvari nuḍḍu abbunamentu lijatu ô cuntu chi usasti pi tràsiri dintra a l'app Mozilla VPN.
bodySubscribeNow2.description: Body of an error message, shown if the user is trying to use the extension without a subscription.

footerSubscribeNow.message: Pi usari stu stinneriu, pi favuri abbònati.
footerSubscribeNow.description: Footer for bodySubscribeNow2, shown if the user is trying to use the extension without a subscription.

btnSubscribeNow.description: Call to action button for users to subscribe to Mozilla VPN.

getHelp.description: Text of a link pointing to a relevant help page.

headerSignedOut.message: Trasi dintra a l'app Mozilla VPN.

bodySignedOut.message: Niscisti di l'app Mozilla VPN. P'usari u stinneriu pi Firefox, grapi l'app nnô computer e trasi nnô to cuntu.

headerNeedsUpdate.description: This is the headline of an error panel.

bodyNeedsUpdate2.message: P'usari stu stinneriu, prima scàrrica e nzìtati l'ùrtima app Mozilla VPN.
bodyNeedsUpdate2.description: This is body copy for an error message.

headerInstallMsg.description: Header if a VPN installation was not found.

bodyOpenMsg.message: P'usari u stinneriu Mozilla VPN pi Firefox, pi favuri prima grapi l'applicazzioni Mozilla VPN.

bodyInstallMsg.message: P'usari stu stinneriu, prima scàrrica e nzìtati l'app Mozilla VPN nnô to computer.

bodyInstallMsgFooter.message: Accura: Mozilla VPN è un sirbizzu cu n'abbunamentu a pagamentu.

btnDownloadNow.description: This is a call to action button to download the VPN.

defaultLocationHeader.message: Usa a pusizzioni di Mozilla VPN.

useDefaultLocationExplainer.message: Usa a stissa pusizzioni di l'app Mozilla VPN pi prutèggiri stu computer.
useDefaultLocationExplainer.description: Explanation of what “Use default Mozilla VPN Location” means.

bodyUnsupportedOSMessage.message: Accamora u stinneriu Mozilla VPN è dispunìbbili sulu nnê dispusitivi Windows.

footnoteUnsupportedOSMessage.message: Stamu travagghiannu pi suppurtari macari macOS e Linux!

websiteProtection.description: A subtitle that is followed by an off icon and the word 'Off'.

learnMore.description: Label of link that leads to SUMO.

onboarding1_title.message: Sdisattiva a VPN pi certi siti spicìfici

onboarding1_body.message: Cû stinneriu pi Firefox, po' sdisattivari a prutizzioni dâ VPN pi certi siti, senza tuccari a prutizzioni pi tutti l'autri cosi.

onboarding2_title.message: Vidi certi siti di pusizzioni diversi

onboarding2_body.message: I nutizzi di Lònnira, u sport di San Paulu, l'accàttiti di Tokyo. Cunfijura pusizzioni spicìfichi pi certi siti pi pirsunalizzari a to navicazzioni.

onboarding3_title.message: Teni a prutizzioni attiva pi Firefox

onboarding3_body.message: Usa u stinneriu p'attivari a prutizzioni VPN pi Firefox — macari quannu a prutizzioni è sdisattiva pû restu dû computer.

next.description: Label of button to progress to next onboarding panel.

skip.description: Label of button to skip onboarding.

done.description: Label of button in final onboarding panel.

headerReEnableFirefoxProtection.message: Attiva arrè a prutizzioni pi Firefox
headerReEnableFirefoxProtection.description: Error panel title for when Firefox is an excluded app.

bodyReEnableFirefoxProtection.message: Accamora Firefox è n'“applicazzioni discruduta” nni Mozilla VPN. P'usari stu stinneriu, grapi l'applicazzioni e vai nne Mpustazzioni > Applicazzioni discruduti e leva Firefox.

settingsPageSubtitle.message: Pi jùnciri o canciari prifirenzi spicìfichi p'un situ, vìsita stu situ e grapi u stinneriu di Mozilla VPN pi Firefox. Doppu, cunfijura i prifirenzi pû situ. I to prifirenzi sunnu attivi sulu quannu è attiva a prutizzioni VPN pi Firefox.

settingsPageTitle.message: Prifirenzi pî siti di Mozilla VPN

noSignal.description: Indicator text describing the status of the VPN.

unstable.description: Indicator text describing the status of the VPN.

connecting.description: Indicator text describing the status of the VPN.

offForWebsite.message: Mozilla VPN sdisattivata pi stu situ

websiteLocationLabel.message: $SERVERLOCATION$: pusizzioni di Mozilla VPN pû situ
websiteLocationLabel.description: Aria label for a flag icon representing the location of the VPN server

alert_conflictingProgram.message: Un prugramma dû to computer sta facennu sfarsijari u stinneriu di Mozilla VPN.

alert_conflictingExtensions.message: È pussìbbili chi autri stinneri ntirfirìscinu cû funziunamentu dû stinneriu Mozilla VPN.

telemetry_toggle_text.message: Sparti dati tècnici e di ntirazzioni
telemetry_toggle_text.description: Label for the Telemetry Opt-In toggle

privacy_notice_link_name.message: Abbisu di risirbatizza dî sirbizzi 'n abbunamentu di Mozilla
privacy_notice_link_name.description: Used as text of the link in 'telemetry_screen_descr'

first-install-body.message: P'ajutàrini a 'mmigghiurari i funziunalità e i pristazzioni, e a arrisòrbiri i prubblemi di manera cchiù assai lesta, po' scartari di pirmittìrici ô stinneriu Mozilla VPN di ricògghiri dati. I dati chi ricugghiemu nun vennu mai lijati a tia, e nun ricugghiemu mai i dati dî siti chi vìsiti. A ricota dî dati nun cancia u funziunamentu dû stinneriu.
first-install-body.description: Body copy on the telemetry consent screen

privacyPolicyIntro.message: Attrovi cchiù minutagghi dî dati chi ricugghiemu nnâ nostra pulìtica di risirbatizza.
privacyPolicyIntro.description: Description of what can be found in the privacy policy. Blurb in the telemetry consent screen.

thankYouForAdding.message: Grazzi chi juncisti u stinneriu Mozilla VPN
thankYouForAdding.description: Headline on the telemetry consent screen

toContinueToTheExtension.message: Pi cuntinuari cû stinneriu, scarta u mercu Mozilla VPN nnâ barra dî stigghi di Firefox.
toContinueToTheExtension.description: Blurb at the bottom of the telemetry consent screen

optionalDataCollection.description: Subtitle on the telemetry consent screen

telemetryListHeader.message: I dati facurtativi chi ricugghiemu nchiùjinu:
telemetryListHeader.description: Headline for a list describing the type of data collected by the extension

technicalData.message: Dati tècnici, a tipu a virsioni dû navicaturi, a virsioni dû stinneriu e minutagghi di l'erruri, accussì putemu trazzari e abbirsari l'erruri di manera cchiù assai efficienti.
technicalData.description: Description of technical data, found on telemetry consent screen.

telemetryCheckboxLabel.message: Dùnaci u pirmisu a Mozilla di ricògghiri dati tècnici e di ntirazzioni

messageSplitTunnelHeader.description: Header that is shown if the current Firefox is affected by Split-Tunneling

messageSplitTunnelBody.message: Accamora Firefox è n'“applicazzioni discruduta” nni Mozilla VPN. P'usari stu stinneriu, grapi l'applicazzioni e vai nne Mpustazzioni > Applicazzioni discruduti e leva Firefox.
messageSplitTunnelBody.description: Helptext body that is shown if the current Firefox is affected by Split-Tunneling

headerSubscriptionNotAvailable.message: L'abbunamentu a Mozilla VPN ancora nun è dispunìbbili nnô to pajisi
headerSubscriptionNotAvailable.description: Header of an Error Screen, shown when the User is in a Country where Mozilla VPN is not offered.

bodySubscriptionNotAvailable.message: L'abbunamentu a Mozilla VPN ancora nun è dispunìbbili nnô to pajisi, ma ti po' jùnciri â lista d'aspettu pi ricìviri n'abbisu quannu sarà pussìbbili fallu. Si già ài n'abbunamentu, pi favuri cuntinua.
bodySubscriptionNotAvailable.description: Body of an Error Screen, shown when the User is in a Country where Mozilla VPN is not offered.

btnjoinWaitlist.description: Button Text, shown when the User is in a Country where Mozilla VPN is not offered.

btnContinue.description: Button Text, shown on an Error screen. Clicking it will continue the current flow.

headlineAutoConnectOptions.description: Headline for the Auto Connect options

labelDescribeAutoStartOnPBM.message: Attiva sempri a VPN quannu nàvichi 'n mudalità privata

bodyAutoStartOnPBM.message: P'attivari st'aḍḍijuta, vai nnô minù dî juncitini, scarta “Stinneriu Mozilla VPN” e scarta “Pirmetti” pi “Abbìa nnê finestri privati”.

labelDescribeAutoStart.message: Attiva sempri a VPN quannu grapi Firefox
